complete_the_registration_process: Enter the code to complete the registration process:
expecting_this_email: If you don't recognize or weren't expecting this email, you can always report suspicious behavior to our support team.
password_reset_request: You are receiving this email because we received a password reset request for your account.
reset_password_code: Enter the code to reset the password:
if_you_did_not_request_password: If you did not request a password reset, no further action is required.
update_email_information: You have received this email due to a request to change the email address associated with your Xperience account.
update_email_information_code: To validate your new email and make the change effective, please enter the following code in the corresponding place:
ignore_this_message: If you have not requested an email change, please ignore this message.
boarding_disembarking: Boarding and disembarking ticket form the Dominican Republic
name: Name
exclusive_use: QR CODE FOR EXCLUSIVE USE FOR CUSTOMS VALIDATION
email_generated_automatically: This email is generated automatically by the system, please do not reply to this message.
not_have_permission: You don't have permission to login.
